verses.text: \w At|strong="G1722"\w* \w that|strong="G1565"\w* \w time|strong="G2540"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* went \w on|strong="G4198"\w* the sabbath \w day|strong="G4521"\w* \w through|strong="G1223"\w* the \w corn|strong="G4702"\w*; \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w* were an \w hungred|strong="G3983"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w began|strong="G0756"\w* to \w pluck|strong="G5089"\w* the ears of \w corn|strong="G4719"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* to \w eat|strong="G2068"\w*.

But \w when|strong="G1161"\w* the \w Pharisees|strong="G5330"\w* \w saw|strong="G1492"\w* \add it\add*, they \w said|strong="G2036"\w* unto \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w Behold|strong="G2400"\w*, \w thy|strong="G4675"\w* \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w* \w do|strong="G4160"\w* that \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w is|strong="G1832"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w lawful|strong="G1832"\w* to \w do|strong="G4160"\w* \w upon|strong="G1722"\w* the sabbath \w day|strong="G4521"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w he|strong="G3588"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w* unto \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \wj \+w Have ye|strong="G0314"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3756"\+w* \+w read|strong="G0314"\+w* \+w what|strong="G5101"\+w* \+w David|strong="G1138"\+w* \+w did|strong="G4160"\+w*, \+w when|strong="G3753"\+w* \+w he|strong="G0846"\+w* \+w was an hungred|strong="G3983"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w they that were|strong="G3588"\+w* \+w with|strong="G3326"\+w* \+w him|strong="G0846"\+w*;\wj*

\wj \+w How|strong="G4459"\+w* \+w he entered|strong="G1525"\+w* \+w into|strong="G1519"\+w* \+w the house|strong="G3624"\+w* \+w of God|strong="G2316"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w did eat|strong="G5315"\+w* \+w the|strong="G0740"\+w* \+w shew|strong="G4286"\+w*\+w bread|strong="G0740"\+w*, \+w which|strong="G3739"\+w* \+w was|strong="G2258"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3756"\+w* \+w lawful|strong="G1832"\+w* \+w for him|strong="G0846"\+w* \+w to eat|strong="G5315"\+w*, \+w neither|strong="G3761"\+w* \+w for them which were|strong="G3588"\+w* \+w with|strong="G3326"\+w* \+w him|strong="G0846"\+w*, \+w but|strong="G1487"\+w* \+w only|strong="G3441"\+w* \+w for the priests|strong="G2409"\+w*?\wj*

\wj \+w Or|strong="G2228"\+w* \+w have ye|strong="G0314"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3756"\+w* \+w read|strong="G0314"\+w* \+w in|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w the law|strong="G3551"\+w*, \+w how that|strong="G3754"\+w* \+w on the sabbath days|strong="G4521"\+w* \+w the priests|strong="G2409"\+w* \+w in|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w the temple|strong="G2411"\+w* \+w profane|strong="G0953"\+w* \+w the sabbath|strong="G4521"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w are|strong="G1526"\+w* \+w blameless|strong="G0338"\+w*?\wj*

\wj \+w But|strong="G1161"\+w* \+w I say|strong="G3004"\+w* \+w unto you|strong="G5213"\+w*, \+w That|strong="G3754"\+w* \+w in this place|strong="G5602"\+w* \+w is|strong="G2076"\+w* \+add one\+add* \+w greater than|strong="G3187"\+w* \+w the temple|strong="G2411"\+w*.\wj*

\wj \+w But|strong="G1161"\+w* \+w if|strong="G1487"\+w* \+w ye had known|strong="G1097"\+w* \+w what|strong="G5101"\+w* \+add this\+add* \+w meaneth|strong="G2076"\+w*, \+w I will have|strong="G2309"\+w* \+w mercy|strong="G1656"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3756"\+w* \+w sacrifice|strong="G2378"\+w*, \+w ye|strong="G2613"\+w* \+w would|strong="G0302"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3756"\+w* \+w have condemned|strong="G2613"\+w* \+w the guiltless|strong="G0338"\+w*.\wj*

\wj \+w For|strong="G1063"\+w* \+w the Son|strong="G5207"\+w* \+w of man|strong="G0444"\+w* \+w is|strong="G2076"\+w* \+w Lord|strong="G2962"\+w* \+w even|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w of the sabbath day|strong="G4521"\+w*.\wj*

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* when he was \w departed|strong="G3327"\w* \w thence|strong="G1564"\w*, he \w went|strong="G2064"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w synagogue|strong="G4864"\w*:

¶ \w And|strong="G2532"\w*, \w behold|strong="G2400"\w*, there \w was|strong="G2258"\w* a \w man|strong="G0444"\w* which \w had|strong="G2192"\w* \add his\add* \w hand|strong="G5495"\w* \w withered|strong="G3584"\w*. \w And|strong="G2532"\w* they \w asked|strong="G1905"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*, Is it \w lawful|strong="G1832"\w* to \w heal|strong="G2323"\w* on the sabbath \w days|strong="G4521"\w*? \w that|strong="G2443"\w* they might \w accuse|strong="G2723"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w he|strong="G3588"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w* unto \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \wj \+w What|strong="G5101"\+w* \+w man|strong="G0444"\+w* \+w shall there be|strong="G2071"\+w* \+w among|strong="G1537"\+w* \+w you|strong="G5216"\+w*, \+w that|strong="G3739"\+w* \+w shall have|strong="G2192"\+w* \+w one|strong="G1520"\+w* \+w sheep|strong="G4263"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w if|strong="G1437"\+w* \+w it|strong="G5124"\+w* \+w fall|strong="G1706"\+w* \+w into|strong="G1519"\+w* \+w a pit|strong="G0999"\+w* \+w on the sabbath day|strong="G4521"\+w*, \+w will he|strong="G2902"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3780"\+w* \+w lay hold on|strong="G2902"\+w* \+w it|strong="G0846"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w lift|strong="G1453"\+w* \+add it\+add* \+w out|strong="G1453"\+w*?\wj*

\wj \+w How much|strong="G4214"\+w* \+w then|strong="G3767"\+w* \+w is|strong="G1308"\+w* \+w a man|strong="G0444"\+w* \+w better|strong="G1308"\+w* \+w than a sheep|strong="G4263"\+w*? \+w Wherefore|strong="G5620"\+w* \+w it is lawful|strong="G1832"\+w* \+w to do|strong="G4160"\+w* \+w well|strong="G2573"\+w* \+w on the sabbath days|strong="G4521"\+w*.\wj*

\w Then|strong="G5119"\w* saith \w he|strong="G3004"\w* to the \w man|strong="G0444"\w*, \wj \+w Stretch forth|strong="G1614"\+w* \+w thine|strong="G4675"\+w* \+w hand|strong="G5495"\+w*.\wj* \w And|strong="G2532"\w* he \w stretched|strong="G1614"\w* \add it\add* \w forth|strong="G1614"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* it was \w restored|strong="G0600"\w* \w whole|strong="G5199"\w*, like \w as|strong="G5613"\w* the \w other|strong="G0243"\w*.

¶ \w Then|strong="G1161"\w* the \w Pharisees|strong="G5330"\w* went \w out|strong="G1831"\w*, and \w held|strong="G2983"\w* a \w council|strong="G4824"\w* \w against|strong="G2596"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w how|strong="G3704"\w* they might \w destroy|strong="G0622"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*.

But \w when|strong="G1161"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w knew|strong="G1097"\w* \add it\add*, he withdrew \w himself|strong="G0402"\w* from \w thence|strong="G1564"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w great|strong="G4183"\w* \w multitudes|strong="G3793"\w* \w followed|strong="G0190"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* he \w healed|strong="G2323"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w*;

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w charged|strong="G2008"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w that|strong="G2443"\w* they \w should|strong="G4160"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w make|strong="G4160"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w known|strong="G5318"\w*:

\w That|strong="G3704"\w* it might be \w fulfilled|strong="G4137"\w* which was \w spoken|strong="G4483"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* \w Esaias|strong="G2268"\w* the \w prophet|strong="G4396"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*,

\w Behold|strong="G2400"\w* \w my|strong="G3450"\w* \w servant|strong="G3816"\w*, \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* I have \w chosen|strong="G0140"\w*; \w my|strong="G3450"\w* \w beloved|strong="G0027"\w*, \w in|strong="G1519"\w* \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* \w my|strong="G3450"\w* \w soul|strong="G5590"\w* is well \w pleased|strong="G2106"\w*: I will \w put|strong="G5087"\w* \w my|strong="G3450"\w* \w spirit|strong="G4151"\w* \w upon|strong="G1909"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* he shall \w shew|strong="G0518"\w* \w judgment|strong="G2920"\w* to the \w Gentiles|strong="G1484"\w*.

He \w shall|strong="G2051"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w strive|strong="G2051"\w*, \w nor|strong="G3761"\w* \w cry|strong="G2905"\w*; \w neither|strong="G3761"\w* \w shall|strong="G0191"\w* any \w man|strong="G5100"\w* \w hear|strong="G0191"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w voice|strong="G5456"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w streets|strong="G4113"\w*.

A \w bruised|strong="G4937"\w* \w reed|strong="G2563"\w* shall \w he|strong="G2608"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w break|strong="G2608"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w smoking|strong="G5188"\w* \w flax|strong="G3043"\w* shall \w he|strong="G4570"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w quench|strong="G4570"\w*, \w till|strong="G2193"\w* he send \w forth|strong="G1544"\w* \w judgment|strong="G2920"\w* \w unto|strong="G1519"\w* \w victory|strong="G3534"\w*.
\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w name|strong="G3686"\w* \w shall|strong="G1679"\w* the \w Gentiles|strong="G1484"\w* \w trust|strong="G1679"\w*.

¶ \w Then|strong="G5119"\w* was \w brought|strong="G4374"\w* unto \w him|strong="G0846"\w* one possessed with a \w devil|strong="G1139"\w*, \w blind|strong="G5185"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w dumb|strong="G2974"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* he \w healed|strong="G2323"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, insomuch \w that|strong="G5620"\w* the \w blind|strong="G5185"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w dumb|strong="G2974"\w* \w both|strong="G2532"\w* \w spake|strong="G2980"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w saw|strong="G0991"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* the \w people|strong="G3793"\w* were \w amazed|strong="G1839"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w*, \w Is|strong="G2076"\w* \w not|strong="G3385"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* the \w son|strong="G5207"\w* of \w David|strong="G1138"\w*?

But \w when|strong="G1161"\w* the \w Pharisees|strong="G5330"\w* \w heard|strong="G0191"\w* \add it\add*, they \w said|strong="G2036"\w*, \w This|strong="G3778"\w* \add fellow\add* \w doth|strong="G1544"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* cast \w out|strong="G1544"\w* \w devils|strong="G1140"\w*, \w but|strong="G1487"\w* \w by|strong="G1722"\w* \w Beelzebub|strong="G0954"\w* the \w prince|strong="G0758"\w* of the \w devils|strong="G1140"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w knew|strong="G1492"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w thoughts|strong="G1761"\w*, and \w said|strong="G2036"\w* unto \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \wj \+w Every|strong="G3956"\+w* \+w kingdom|strong="G0932"\+w* \+w divided|strong="G3307"\+w* \+w against|strong="G2596"\+w* \+w itself|strong="G1438"\+w* \+w is brought to desolation|strong="G2049"\+w*; \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w every|strong="G3956"\+w* \+w city|strong="G4172"\+w* \+w or|strong="G2228"\+w* \+w house|strong="G3614"\+w* \+w divided|strong="G3307"\+w* \+w against|strong="G2596"\+w* \+w itself|strong="G1438"\+w* \+w shall|strong="G2476"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3756"\+w* \+w stand|strong="G2476"\+w*:\wj*

\wj \+w And|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w if|strong="G1487"\+w* \+w Satan|strong="G4567"\+w* \+w cast out|strong="G1544"\+w* \+w Satan|strong="G4567"\+w*, \+w he is divided|strong="G3307"\+w* \+w against|strong="G1909"\+w* \+w himself|strong="G1438"\+w*; \+w how|strong="G4459"\+w* \+w shall|strong="G2476"\+w* \+w then|strong="G3767"\+w* \+w his|strong="G0846"\+w* \+w kingdom|strong="G0932"\+w* \+w stand|strong="G2476"\+w*?\wj*

\wj \+w And|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w if|strong="G1487"\+w* \+w I|strong="G1473"\+w* \+w by|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w Beelzebub|strong="G0954"\+w* \+w cast out|strong="G1544"\+w* \+w devils|strong="G1140"\+w*, \+w by|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w whom do|strong="G5101"\+w* \+w your|strong="G5216"\+w* \+w children|strong="G5207"\+w* \+w cast|strong="G1544"\+w* \+add them\+add* \+w out|strong="G1544"\+w*? \+w therefore|strong="G1223"\+w* \+w they|strong="G0846"\+w* \+w shall be|strong="G2071"\+w* \+w your|strong="G5216"\+w* \+w judges|strong="G2923"\+w*.\wj*

\wj \+w But|strong="G1161"\+w* \+w if|strong="G1487"\+w* \+w I|strong="G1473"\+w* \+w cast out|strong="G1544"\+w* \+w devils|strong="G1140"\+w* \+w by|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w the Spirit|strong="G4151"\+w* \+w of God|strong="G2316"\+w*, \+w then|strong="G0686"\+w* \+w the kingdom|strong="G0932"\+w* \+w of God|strong="G2316"\+w* \+w is come|strong="G5348"\+w* \+w unto|strong="G1909"\+w* \+w you|strong="G5209"\+w*.\wj*

\wj \+w Or else|strong="G2228"\+w* \+w how|strong="G4459"\+w* \+w can|strong="G1410"\+w* \+w one|strong="G5100"\+w* \+w enter|strong="G1525"\+w* \+w into|strong="G1519"\+w* \+w a strong man’s|strong="G2478"\+w* \+w house|strong="G3614"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w spoil|strong="G1283"\+w* \+w his|strong="G0846"\+w* \+w goods|strong="G4632"\+w*, \+w except|strong="G1437"\+w* \+w he|strong="G1210"\+w* \+w first|strong="G4412"\+w* \+w bind|strong="G1210"\+w* \+w the strong man|strong="G2478"\+w*? \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w then|strong="G5119"\+w* \+w he will spoil|strong="G1283"\+w* \+w his|strong="G0846"\+w* \+w house|strong="G3614"\+w*.\wj*

\wj \+w He that is|strong="G5607"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3361"\+w* \+w with|strong="G3326"\+w* \+w me|strong="G1700"\+w* \+w is|strong="G2076"\+w* \+w against|strong="G2596"\+w* \+w me|strong="G1700"\+w*; \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w he that gathereth|strong="G4863"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3361"\+w* \+w with|strong="G3326"\+w* \+w me|strong="G1700"\+w* \+w scattereth abroad|strong="G4650"\+w*.\wj*

\wj ¶ \+w Wherefore|strong="G1223"\+w* \+w I say|strong="G3004"\+w* \+w unto you|strong="G5213"\+w*, \+w All manner of|strong="G3956"\+w* \+w sin|strong="G0266"\+w* \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w blasphemy|strong="G0988"\+w* \+w shall be forgiven|strong="G0863"\+w* \+w unto men|strong="G0444"\+w*: \+w but|strong="G1161"\+w* the \+w blasphemy|strong="G0988"\+w* \+add against\+add* \+w the|strong="G4151"\+w* \+add Holy\+add* \+w Ghost|strong="G4151"\+w* \+w shall|strong="G0863"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3756"\+w* \+w be forgiven|strong="G0863"\+w* \+w unto men|strong="G0444"\+w*.\wj*

\wj \+w And|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w whosoever|strong="G3748"\+w* \+w speaketh|strong="G2036"\+w* \+w a word|strong="G3056"\+w* \+w against|strong="G2596"\+w* \+w the Son|strong="G5207"\+w* \+w of man|strong="G0444"\+w*, \+w it shall be forgiven|strong="G0863"\+w* \+w him|strong="G0846"\+w*: \+w but|strong="G1161"\+w* \+w who|strong="G3739"\+w*\+w soever|strong="G0302"\+w* \+w speaketh|strong="G2036"\+w* \+w against|strong="G2596"\+w* \+w the|strong="G4151"\+w* \+w Holy|strong="G0040"\+w* \+w Ghost|strong="G4151"\+w*, \+w it shall|strong="G0863"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3756"\+w* \+w be forgiven|strong="G0863"\+w* \+w him|strong="G0846"\+w*, \+w neither|strong="G3777"\+w* \+w in|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w this|strong="G5129"\+w* \+w world|strong="G0165"\+w*, \+w neither|strong="G3777"\+w* \+w in|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w the|strong="G3195"\+w* \+add world\+add* \+w to come|strong="G3195"\+w*.\wj*

\wj \+w Either|strong="G2228"\+w* \+w make|strong="G4160"\+w* \+w the tree|strong="G1186"\+w* \+w good|strong="G2570"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w his|strong="G0846"\+w* \+w fruit|strong="G2590"\+w* \+w good|strong="G2570"\+w*; \+w or else|strong="G2228"\+w* \+w make|strong="G4160"\+w* \+w the tree|strong="G1186"\+w* \+w corrupt|strong="G4550"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w his|strong="G0846"\+w* \+w fruit|strong="G2590"\+w* \+w corrupt|strong="G4550"\+w*: \+w for|strong="G1063"\+w* \+w the tree|strong="G1186"\+w* \+w is known|strong="G1097"\+w* \+w by|strong="G1537"\+w* \+add his\+add* \+w fruit|strong="G2590"\+w*.\wj*

\wj \+w O generation|strong="G1081"\+w* \+w of vipers|strong="G2191"\+w*, \+w how|strong="G4459"\+w* \+w can ye|strong="G1410"\+w*, \+w being|strong="G5607"\+w* \+w evil|strong="G4190"\+w*, \+w speak|strong="G2980"\+w* \+w good things|strong="G0018"\+w*? \+w for|strong="G1063"\+w* \+w out|strong="G1537"\+w* \+w of the abundance|strong="G4051"\+w* \+w of the heart|strong="G2588"\+w* \+w the mouth|strong="G4750"\+w* \+w speaketh|strong="G2980"\+w*.\wj*

\wj \+w A|strong="G0444"\+w* \+w good|strong="G0018"\+w* \+w man|strong="G0444"\+w* \+w out|strong="G1537"\+w* \+w of the good|strong="G0018"\+w* \+w treasure|strong="G2344"\+w* \+w of the heart|strong="G2588"\+w* \+w bringeth forth|strong="G1544"\+w* \+w good things|strong="G0018"\+w*: \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w an|strong="G0444"\+w* \+w evil|strong="G4190"\+w* \+w man|strong="G0444"\+w* \+w out|strong="G1537"\+w* \+w of the|strong="G2344"\+w* \+w evil|strong="G4190"\+w* \+w treasure|strong="G2344"\+w* \+w bringeth forth|strong="G1544"\+w* \+w evil things|strong="G4190"\+w*.\wj*

\wj \+w But|strong="G1161"\+w* \+w I say|strong="G3004"\+w* \+w unto you|strong="G5213"\+w*, \+w That|strong="G3754"\+w* \+w every|strong="G3956"\+w* \+w idle|strong="G0692"\+w* \+w word|strong="G4487"\+w* \+w that|strong="G3739"\+w* \+w men|strong="G0444"\+w* \+w shall speak|strong="G2980"\+w*, \+w they shall give|strong="G0591"\+w* \+w account|strong="G3056"\+w* \+w thereof|strong="G0846"\+w* \+w in|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w the day|strong="G2250"\+w* \+w of judgment|strong="G2920"\+w*.\wj*
